name: Sinuous Vines
text: Your vines can wrap around foes you grapple.
prerequisites: Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6, gathlain.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks to grapple, and your wings count as a free hand for the purpose of grappling a foe. You can maintain a grapple with your wings and still make attacks with your other limbs. You cannot fly while maintaining a grapple with your wings.
